attributes.action: sack Jacqui Smith for creating an environment where an MP (Damian Green) can be arrested for doing his job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in a democracy, and it is vital that our MPs are able to highlight government failure.  The leaking of Home Office information is an internal issue and not a matter for the police.  The Minister should take full responsibility for either incompetence or undermining our democratic rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
